name: ZenRadio-Sleep&MeditationMusic
0:
”Alexa, Open Zen Radio”
”Alexa, Tell Zen Radio to play Study Music”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zen radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Experience relaxation in a better way. Whether you want to reduce daily stress, anxiety, or you have trouble sleeping, Zen Radio has got you covered. Tune in to over 35 channels of hand-picked sounds by our in-house curators to find your balance and inner peace.
 
Zen Radio helps you cater to your well being with a broad spectrum of relaxing sounds. If you're looking for meditation music, a path to calmness, or want to get a more positive outlook on life, it's all just a tap away. Find your favorite channels, press play and enjoy the music! 
 
Features: 
 
- Over 35 different stations of relaxation music streaming 24/7 
- Stream exclusive music, hand-picked by dedicated channel curators with decades of experience
- Use the style filters to find your favorite music styles and save your favorites for easy access on our Website
- Share tracks and channels you've discovered with friends on our Website
- Stream music in the foreground or in the background 
- View track titles and album art on display devices like Echo Show 
 
Check out some of our channels: 
 
Sleep Relaxation
Study Music
Meditation
Deep Focus
Relaxing Piano
Deep Concentration
Shamanic Music
Tibetan Singing Bowls
Reiki
Zen
Pregnancy Relaxation
Nature
Peaceful Healing
Space Dreams
Chillout
Downtempo Lounge
...and many more
 
 
Zen Radio Premium: 
 
- Enjoy your favorite sounds 100% ad-free 
- Better sound quality: Choose between 320k MP3 and 128k AAC options 
- Stream Zen Radio on non Alexa devices like Roku, Pioneer, Squeezebox, Denon, Phillips, or any that support network streaming, vTuner or TuneIn 
- Premium access to all our other music platforms: JAZZRADIO.com, ClassicalRadio.com, DI.FM, RadioTunes, and ROCKRADIO.com. Enjoy access to over 200 additional human-curated channels of high-quality music!

HOW IT WORKS
Streaming via Amazon Alexa is available to *Zen Radio Premium* members only. Make sure you're logged in to your Zen Radio Premium account, activate the skill, lay back and enjoy the music!
